channel.title: Herald-Tribune (Custom RSS - Broad Article Grab)
channel.description: A personal RSS feed with broader article scraping from heraldtribune.com

item.title: Poynter Institute looks at the history of the media in museum exhibit
item.description: A different kind of exhibition will have a brief run at Sarasota’s The Ringling focusing on the history of journalism and the media and the role the news business plays in society.

item.title: 5 best things to do in Sarasota area this weekend (July 31-Aug. 3)
item.description: Don’t let the heat slow you down — there’s too muchfun happening around Sarasota and Manateethis weekend.

item.title: Here's the 2025 team-by-team Sarasota and Manatee high school football schedules
item.description: The 2025 high school football season begins with Florida High School Athletic Association Kickoff Classics on Aug. 14. The regular season begins Aug. 21 and runs through Oct. 31 (with the exception of IMG which will play into November) with most teams playing 10 games in 11 weeks.

item.title: State quiet on cost of migrant flights under new program
item.description: Florida is buying commercial flights for migrants as an alternative to detention, according to the federal government.

item.title: What does TACO mean? Trump issues new tariffs after two…
item.description: PresidentDonald Trumpsigned anexecutive order to issue a new slate of tariffson July 31, the latest in a long saga ofpolicy changes for importsfrom countries around the world.

item.title: USPS keeps losing my mail — and my trust
item.description: The recent article on how the U.S. Postal Service "continues delivering despite its challenges" deserves a response ("U.S. Postal Service marks 250 years," July 26).

item.title: Mangrove Rangers study mangrove health on Sarasota and Manatee coast
item.description: A group of advocates called theMangrove Rangersare using drones to document the health of mangrove forests in Sarasota Bay and advocate for better local protection of the key natural resources by Manatee and Sarasota counties.
